description: Created in 2015, Porto Tech Hub has established itself as one of the most important technological conferences in Portugal. In it’s short time of existence, we witnessed the presence of gurus of the most important companies worldwide, such as Google, Facebook, Ebay, Spotify and IBM. In 2018, and for its fourth edition, the Porto Tech Hub Conference is back in the same venue, the Alfândega Porto Congress Centre. Join us in shaping the future!
name: Porto Tech Hub Conference
